feed.title: Gnomengineer
feed.subtitle: A small website displaying my experience and projects done as a software engineer

entry.title: Welcome to … well… here, I guess!

link.title: Welcome to ... well... here, I guess!

entry.content:
Hello

You seem to have stumbled upon this blog / project portfolio / self-promotion of me, the gnomengineer.
I started using this alias a while back and it still fits me to this day.

My real name is Daniel and I’m an engineer in real as well. I finished my study as Software Engineer 2018 and work now for already aa couple of years in this field.
As I begin to gather more knowledge I want to share this with you.

Knowledge has a Beginning but no End
— random internet quote

Even thou my work experience is relatively low I already encountered a lot of situations and learned already a lot of stuff. With that and all the information and technology the future brings, I started this website.

From time to time I will blog a bit. These blog posts will be a kind of a how-to on the topic they cover. Keep in mind that these posts are not a set way and should rather be used as guidelines through your work.

I guess that’s as close as I can explain it.

On the project side I will include ongoing or finished projects which are worth sharing. With worth sharing I mean they follow a plan and can give the developer or user more concrete information about them.

All in all, I hope you can get some value out of here.

— sincerely, gnomengineer
